title: Me when a marksmen gets Ultimate skin instead of a toplaner

replies.body: Me when Zoe gets a skin before Kled :^D
Well, he may get a skin before/at the same time, but then again he is a toplaner so - unlikely
If he was getting a skin I think they would've mentioned it :/ but I can hope

Prepare your anus cause Zoe might get a Star Guardian one too according to a leak that had Dragon Master Swain and a possible early iteration of Swain. https://drive.google.com/open?id=1xrj-xAGpK3Yq3aOGYm4UcxKQUjkxFdD8
i just new riot would give zoe a new skin quick it seemed like a riot thing to do, and i bet shes gonna get a star guardian skin this year aswell.

She probably will unfortunately (well kinda I think it'll look great but still). A leak that seemed to have an earlier iteration of the Swain rework AND Dragon Master Swain claimed this. Along with SG Taliyah, Evelynn, Caitlyn and I think Sejuani.

EDIT: I think I found the one: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1xrj-xAGpK3Yq3aOGYm4UcxKQUjkxFdD8
God I hope not, I don't want that thing in my second favorite skinline
I don't think Zoe will get Star Guardian, she already looks too close to it.
